00036 #include <spottone.h>
00037 
00038 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 // An ASR envelope on a complex phasor,
00040 // with asynchronous trigger for R stage.
00041 // A/R use sine shaping.
00042 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 
00044 BOOLEAN SpotTone( SpotToneGen st )
00045 {
00046     int i,
00047         n = st->size;
00048 
00049     ComplexOSC( st->osc.gen );
00050 
00051     for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00052     {
00053 
00054         // in an envelope stage?
00055 
00056         if ( st->stage == SpotTone_RISE )
00057         {
00058 
00059             // still going?
00060             if ( st->rise.have++ < st->rise.want )
00061             {
00062                 st->curr += st->rise.incr;
00063                 st->mul = ( REAL ) ( st->scl * sin( st->curr * M_PI / 2.0 ) );
00064             }
00065             else
00066             {
00067                 // no, assert steady-state, force level
00068                 st->curr = 1.0;
00069                 st->mul = st->scl;
00070                 st->stage = SpotTone_STDY;
00071                 // won't come back into envelopes
00072                 // until FALL asserted from outside
00073             }
00074 
00075         }
00076         else if ( st->stage == SpotTone_FALL )
00077         {
00078 
00079             // still going?
00080             if ( st->fall.have++ < st->fall.want )
00081             {
00082                 st->curr -= st->fall.incr;
00083                 st->mul = ( REAL ) ( st->scl * sin( st->curr * M_PI / 2.0 ) );
00084             }
00085             else
00086             {
00087                 // no, assert trailing, force level
00088                 st->curr = 0.0;
00089                 st->mul = 0.0;
00090                 st->stage = SpotTone_HOLD;
00091                 // won't come back into envelopes hereafter
00092             }
00093         }
00094         // apply envelope
00095         // (same base as osc.gen internal buf)
00096         CXBdata( st->buf, i ) = Cscl( CXBdata( st->buf, i ), st->mul );
00097     }
00098 
00099     // indicate whether it's turned itself off
00100     // sometime during this pass
00101 
00102     return st->stage != SpotTone_HOLD;
00103 }
00104 
00105 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00106 // turn spotting on with current settings
00107 
00108 void SpotToneOn( SpotToneGen st )
00109 {
00110 
00111     // gain is in dB
00112 
00113     st->scl = ( REAL ) pow( 10.0, st->gain / 20.0 );
00114     st->curr = st->mul = 0.0;
00115 
00116     // A/R times are in msec
00117 
00118     st->rise.want = ( int ) ( 0.5 + st->sr * ( st->rise.dur / 1e3 ) );
00119     st->rise.have = 0;
00120     if ( st->rise.want <= 1 )
00121         st->rise.incr = 1.0;
00122     else
00123         st->rise.incr = ( REAL ) ( 1.0 / ( st->rise.want - 1 ) );
00124 
00125     st->fall.want = ( int ) ( 0.5 + st->sr * ( st->fall.dur / 1e3 ) );
00126     st->fall.have = 0;
00127     if ( st->fall.want <= 1 )
00128         st->fall.incr = 1.0;
00129     else
00130         st->fall.incr = ( REAL ) ( 1.0 / ( st->fall.want - 1 ) );
00131 
00132     // freq is in Hz
00133 
00134     OSCfreq( st->osc.gen ) = 2.0 * M_PI * st->osc.freq / st->sr;
00135     OSCphase( st->osc.gen ) = 0.0;
00136 
00137     st->stage = SpotTone_RISE;
00138 }
00139 
00140 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00141 // initiate turn-off
00142 
00143 void SpotToneOff( SpotToneGen st )
00144 {
00145     st->stage = SpotTone_FALL;
00146 }
00147 
00148 //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00149 
00150 void setSpotToneGenVals( SpotToneGen st, REAL gain, REAL freq, REAL rise,
00151                          REAL fall )
00152 {
00153     st->gain = gain;
00154     st->osc.freq = freq;
00155     st->rise.dur = rise;
00156     st->fall.dur = fall;
00157 }
00158 
00159 SpotToneGen newSpotToneGen( REAL gain,  // dB
00160                             REAL freq, REAL rise,   // ms
00161                             REAL fall,  // ms
00162                             int size, REAL samplerate )
00163 {
00164 
00165     SpotToneGen st = ( SpotToneGen ) safealloc( 1,
00166                                                 sizeof( SpotToneGenDesc ),
00167                                                 "SpotToneGenDesc" );
00168 
00169     setSpotToneGenVals( st, gain, freq, rise, fall );
00170     st->size = size;
00171     st->sr = samplerate;
00172 
00173     st->osc.gen =
00174         newOSC( st->size, ComplexTone, st->osc.freq, 0.0, st->sr,
00175                 "SpotTone osc" );
00176 
00177     // overload oscillator buf
00178     st->buf = newCXB( st->size, OSCCbase( st->osc.gen ), "SpotToneGen buf" );
00179 
00180     return st;
00181 }
00182 
00183 void delSpotToneGen( SpotToneGen st )
00184 {
00185     if ( st )
00186     {
00187         delCXB( st->buf );
00188         delOSC( st->osc.gen );
00189         safefree( ( char * ) st );
00190     }
00191 }
